synopsis.text:
The narrative unfolds a colossal universe of primordial times, introduced by nine colossal dragons and an enigmatic bronze coffin. This breathtaking spectacle, captured by a drifting space probe, leaves spectators questioning if they've been transported back in time or to the far reaches of the cosmos.

In this mythical realm, immortality begins to emerge, and supernatural occurrences become the norm. Countless individuals embark on their unique paths, driven by an insatiable thirst for power and eternal life. Their fervor mirrors the relentless waves of the ocean, their blood boiling like an active volcano.

The story follows a group of thirty-three former classmates who reunite post-graduation, only to have their destinies altered by the discovery of an ancient bronze coffin. This coffin, rumored to contain the remains of nine great dragons, transports them from Earth to an unknown planet.

To survive and find their way back home, they must navigate this new world of cultivation and follow the path of ancient deities. As they climb the celestial road and sing their songs, the question remains: Will any of them achieve immortality, or will their endeavors lead them to their doom? This captivating tale is adapted from the first part of the Zhetian trilogy, penned by the esteemed Qidian platinum author, Chen Dong.
